0: Welcome to Galapagos, the mystical island! The island is relatively unknown to the outer world. Your name is ABC and you’re the descendant of the former rulers of  Galapagos. Your dynasty had control of the island several centuries ago and through magical visions you’ve discovered of its ability to produce some very powerful cards. While your family was in control of the island, these cards were used as tools to advance civilization, and their usage was limited to the island. However, in recent times, invaders have taken control of the island and are using the cards for their illicit businesses. The cartel currently in control of the island intend to use these cards and their powers against the innocent outside the island. Your mission should you choose to accept it, is to stop the mining, trafficking and use of these cards outside the island! Alastor is your guide and although there’s something weird about him, he is by your side to guide you through your discovery and quests on this island.

1.title: The Spy
1.story: Alastor: I’m glad you’ve arrived. The first quest in your journey is to find and defeat ZELUS, who serves as the spy master for DIONYSUS, your final opponent. He is feared by nobles and common people alike. He is a skilled manipulator and commands a network of spies across the island.
1.battle_conversation: Zelus: I’ve been expecting you, ABC. What took you so long?#ABC: Glad to be here!#Zelus: Do you really think you could walk all over me with the cards you have collected?#ABC: Is lip-service all you do?
1.after_battle: ABC: I hate to say “I told you so”, I’m going to sing it instead. Now, do you want to tell me who is my next opponent or shall I crush you again?#Zelus: Fine young lad, your next opponent is Brutus.#ABC: You don’t mean Junius Brutus, do you?#Zelus: Yes, Junius Brutus, your old friend. You should be impressed with him, his ascendance on this island has been quite speedy.

3.title: Gaurd
3.story: He is one of the closet advisor to Dionysus. Swift, stealthy and exceptionally lethal. Once he was as great as his fame made him. His knowledge was deep and his hands marvelously skilled. But his pride and arrogance turned him into a traitor. He is a Man of Skill and master at manipulating life.
3.battle_conversation: Gaurd: Who the hell are you?#ABC: I am Satan, I came here to free your soul from your body.#Guard: hahahahahhahahahaha, I am the devil, look at me and scream if you wish.#ABC: lol, kids these days.#Guard: Surrender to me and I will let you live.#ABC: Another joke, you are not even worth my anger.#Guard: I will beat you and perhaps I will kill you.#ABC: you don’t frighten me and you are not going to win.
3.after_battle: Guard: you think you will come here and free this island from the power of Dionysus. More you go further, more you are getting trapped. hahahahhaha Falcone will be happy to see you....hahahahaha#ABC: yes,I will but you will not be here to see it.

4.title: Advisor
4.story: Precise, deadly and one of the deadliest assassins this world has ever seen. He is trained to be proficient with various weapons. In battle he focus primarily on his sword play, preferring close combat to long scale fight. He posses great speed and is not easy to defeat.
4.battle_conversation: Advisor: Welcome Hommie, I was expecting you. what took you so long?#ABC: ahhh I didn’t know that you were missing me dude, I am flattered by the attention.#Advisor: Come join us and you will see yourself lying on the bed of money.#ABC: you think money motivates me, Get ready to die Falcone.#Advisor: I think we both know how is gonna end, You are going down#ABC: I will not fail and I am not afraid of you and I will do whatever it takes.#Advisor: Lets begin then.
4.after_battle: Advisor: You have no idea what you did, Dionysus is going to kill you at end but first you should face Hermes, the Trafficker.

5.title: Trafficker
5.story: Hermes is an enormously powerful being with a very powerful card and though at first he might look like an old man but his true form is that of a powerful mystical creature. He is the master of trade and border crossings and is a messenger of  DIONYSUS.
5.battle_conversation: Hermes: You have come a long way. It would be a pity to see you go back to square one.#ABC: I have not come here to go back, Hermes. I have come here to defeat the evil.#Hermes: Woah! cOmE hErE tO DeFeaT tHe EviL! Are you a Tolkien Fan or what?#ABC: I don’t know whether you are good at this but you are definitely not good at comebacks. Now let’s battle or do you wanna settle this with trash talk? Psst: You are gonna lose in trash talk.
5.after_battle: ABC: Psst, you wanna know a secret? You are not a great fighter either.#Hermes: You shouldn’t be too proud of yourself lad. You still have a long way to go.#ABC: Please keep talking, I only yawn when I am super fascinated.#Hermes: Well, you can’t defeat Plutus by talking.

6.title: Accountant
6.story: Plutus, the one who handles all the gold and wealth.He is a hedonist, a pleasure-seeker and  he uses his highly advance cards to augment his abilities and perform feats that might be normally beyond him.
6.battle_conversation: Plutus: Here’s what I wanna know, who are you?#ABC: I am ABC-I have come here to fight you.#Plutus: Huh?..Oh good.. I have come here to fight you.#Plutus: Well, what are we waiting for?
